title: 'Effortless Floor Cleaning with Scotch-Brite 2-in-1 Spin Mop Head and Handle'
body: '"I purchased the Scotch-Brite Spin Mop Head and Handle specifically designed for the Scotch-Brite 2 in 1 Spin mop and I must say it\'s a very useful and durable product. It\'s flexible to use and makes mopping the floor easy. Thanks to this mop I no longer experience back pain."'

title: 'Nice product.'

title: 'Not original product but of ok quality
body: '3.0 out of 5 stars''1Though scothch brite is a brand the label is not anywhere on the product 2 original handle was not this heavy and broad. So working with this is likeproblem 3. Quality was okay but price wise very high 4. Packaging was very bad. NOT ORIGNAL PRODUCT'

title: 'Bit heavy'
body: 'Bought this mop to use with Scotch Brite jumper bucket even though I understood from the description that it is made to use with 2 in 1 spin mop bucket because spare jumper mop without the bucket is not available. This mop is a bit heavy compared to the original mop that came with jumper bucket.'
